name: LOST Memorial Wristbands
description: $1 from every wristband purchased will go to the Children's Defense Fund! --- SHIPPING WITHIN U.S.: Orders of 1-6 bands = $1.75 Orders of 7-14 bands = $2.25 Orders of 15+ bands = $4.00 SHIPPING OUTSIDE U.S.: Orders of 1-6 bands = $3.00 Orders of 7-14 bands = $4.00 Orders of 15+ bands = $6.00 --- Please keep in mind that orders will not ship until early to mid-June. The two of us are moving across the country at the end of May and will need to put shipping on hold for a bit until we get settled. Thank you for your understanding! --- SIZING INFO: Our REGULAR size is 8.38" in circumference (for most adults) Our SMALL size is 7.38" in circumference (for children or adults with especially small wrists and hands) The standard size of an adult LiveStrong bracelet is 7.96"
